entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
